epic_coverage: Cloud Infrastructure, Core Backend, Mobile, Web
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster, Database, CI/CD Pipelines, B2C Auth Prototype, Mobile Schema
demo_objectives: Show AKS cluster active; Demonstrate CI/CD pipeline run; Show B2C token issuance
success_criteria: Infra provisioned; CI/CD operational; Auth prototype validates tokens
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C complexity; Infrastructure provisioning delays
mitigation_strategies: Front-load B2C work; Pair programming on Terraform

epic_coverage: Core Backend, Mobile Applications, Cloud Infrastructure
key_deliverables: Routing Service, WebSocket Gateway, Mobile Sync Adapter, Background Geo
demo_objectives: Show auto-routing logic; Demonstrate real-time socket connection; Show mobile sync
success_criteria: Routing query <100ms; WebSocket scales; Mobile syncs offline data
risk_factors: Spatial query performance; Mobile background location consistency
mitigation_strategies: Synthetic load testing; Physical device testing early
